text: @WhiteHouse Still #BehindThe8Ball @Mike_Pence people who have symptoms still can't get #COVID19 tests nor can asymptomatic people #SupplyChains are broken Testing Capacity means zilch when supplies to run the machines are unavailable #SAD #DoBetter
